org.apache.giraph.aggregators

类 AggregatorWrapper<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.aggregators.AggregatorWrapper<A>
  • 类型参数:
    A - Aggregated value

    public class AggregatorWrapper<A extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
    Wrapper for aggregators. Keeps two instances of an aggregator - one for the value from previous super step, and one for the value which is being generated in current super step.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AggregatorWrapper(Class<? extends Aggregator<A>> aggregatorClass, boolean persistent) 

    • 方法概要

      Add a new value to current aggregator

      Return new aggregated value which is neutral to aggregate operation

      Get class of wrapped aggregator
      A getCurrentAggregatedValue()
      Get current aggregated value
      A getPreviousAggregatedValue()
      Get aggregated value from previous super step

      Check if current aggregator was changed

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AggregatorWrapper

        public AggregatorWrapper(Class<? extends Aggregator<A>> aggregatorClass,
                 boolean persistent)
                  throws IllegalAccessException,
                         InstantiationException
        参数:
        aggregatorClass - Class type of the aggregator
        persistent - False iff aggregator should be reset at the end of each super step
        抛出:
        IllegalAccessException
        InstantiationException

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPreviousAggregatedValue

        public A getPreviousAggregatedValue()
        Get aggregated value from previous super step
        返回:
        Aggregated value from previous super step

      • setPreviousAggregatedValue

        public void setPreviousAggregatedValue(A value)
        Set aggregated value for previous super step
        参数:
        value - Aggregated value to set

      • isPersistent

        public boolean isPersistent()
        Check if aggregator is persistent
        返回:
        False iff aggregator should be reset at the end of each super step

      • isChanged

        public boolean isChanged()
        Check if current aggregator was changed
        返回:
        Whether anyone changed current value since the moment it was reset

      • aggregateCurrent

        public void aggregateCurrent(A value)
        Add a new value to current aggregator
        参数:
        value - Value to be aggregated

      • getCurrentAggregatedValue

        public void resetCurrentAggregator()
        Reset the value of current aggregator to neutral value

        public A createInitialValue()
        Return new aggregated value which is neutral to aggregate operation
        返回:
